content:
# The furnace has successfully smelted 1 stone into 1 stone brick, but it currently shows a warning of "no ingredients to smelt," indicating that there is only 1 stone left in the furnace and no more stones to process.

# To continue the production of stone bricks, I will need to insert additional stones into the furnace. 
# Given that I have 13 stones in my inventory, I can insert more stones to keep the smelting process ongoing.

# I will insert 5 more stones into the furnace to allow it to continue smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.Stone, target=furnace_info, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 stones into the stone furnace.
print(f"Updated inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after the insertion.
